title: Kurukshetra 2025 in a digital economy & AI era
description: Ullhas Pagey We live in an age when Artificial Intelligence (AI) predicts our desires before we feel them and quietly reshapes the very meaning of human intelligence. The digital economy has woven an invisible web...

title: India development centre to play key role AI development: Intuit Chief AI Officer
description: Intui's India centre has been leading from the front in building new AI capabilities for the company.

title: Congress Debates AI Economic Bubble: AOC Warns of Inequality Risks
description: Lawmakers on Capitol Hill are debating an emerging AI economic bubble, with Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez warning of overvaluations risking inequality like the dot-com crash, while others view it as genuine innovation. Industry leaders and data fuel divisions, prompting potential regulatory actions amid global competition. The discourse highlights tensions between hype and sustainability.

title: India’s GCCs turn key testing ground for agentic AI ideas
description: The global capability centres (GCCs) in India are becoming a frontline testing ground for agentic artificial intelligence (AI), powered by a sharp increases in investment, deeper innovation mandates and a restructuring of operating models. The EY GCC Pulse Survey 2025 shows that 58% of the GCCs are investing in agentic AI and 83% are expanding [...]

title: MyHair app uses AI to spot early signs of balding
description: The app helps users track hair loss with photo analysis and verified reviews.The post MyHair app uses AI to spot early signs of balding appeared first on Technobaboy.
